greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Min {x : sigma(x) = phi(nx), x is not a prime}, least nonprime solutions to sigma(x) = phi(nx).
comment: Is a(n)=A256527(n) for n>=5? - _Manfred Scheucher_, May 28 2015
mathematica: ds[x_, de_] := DivisorSigma[1, x]-EulerPhi[de*x] a[n_] := Block[{m=1, s=ds[m, n]}, While[(s !=0||PrimeQ[m])&&!Greater[m, 4000000], m++ ]; m]; Table[a[n], {n, 22}]
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Sep 29 2003
